value_i18n.ar_SA: We have designed our Partner Marketing programs to help you put your ideas into action, and drive more demand for your unique services and Liferay DXP. Partner Marketing is about communicating with you effectively and efficiently, so you have the information you need to drive your Liferay business and about enabling you to go to market with co-branded demand generation activities to fill your pipeline.
